{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Wireless Smart Speaker |caption2 = Personal Home Assistant - Digital Media Streamer |pp = https://store.google.com/product/google_home_mini |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->

|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Toshiba;TC58NVG1S3HBA16; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TC4G63CFR-PBA; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/A4R-H0A A4R-H0A] (2017-09-20) - Multimedia Device
"Model: H0A" is visible in photos of the base of the device in [https://www.theverge.com/2017/10/4/16405218/new-google-home-mini-max-speakers-photos-video-hands-on this article]
{{FCC ST|03/17/2018|indexme.}}
===Specifications=== *Wi-Fi: 802.11abgn/ac Dual-Band (2.4/5GHz); Bluetooth 4.1 LE *Drivers: 1x 1.58" (40mm) driver; Connectors: 1x Micro-USB port *Audio Format: HE-AAC, LC-AAC+, MP3, FLAC, Vorbis, WAV (LPCM) *Voice Control: Far-field Voice recognition supports hands-free use *Supported Operating Systems: Android 4.2, iOS 9.1 and higher *Requirements: Router for Wi-Fi use, Google Home app running *Power Requirements: DC 5V 1.8A; Power Cord Length: 1.5m *Dimensions (Ø x H): 98 mm x 42 mm; Weight Device: 173 g
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.theverge.com/2017/10/4/16405218/new-google-home-mini-max-speakers-photos-video-hands-on ''First look at Google Home Mini and Max'' on '''The Verge'''] *[https://medium.com/@justlv/google-home-mini-teardown-comparison-to-echo-dot-and-giving-technology-a-voice-c59a23724a26 ''Google Home Mini teardown, comparison to Echo Dot'' on '''Medium'''] :CPU: [[Marvell]] 88DE3006 ([[Synaptics]] BG2CDP) @1.2GHz :Dual Core ARM Cortex-A7 (Armada 1500 Mini Plus) *[https://www.allaboutcircuits.com/news/teardown-tuesday-google-home-mini/ ''Teardown'' on '''AllAboutCircuits'''] (PCB images) :CPU: [[Marvell]] 88DE3006-BTK2 (Armada 1500 Mini Plus) :Flash: [[Toshiba]] TC58NVG1S3HBA16 :RAM: [[Samsung]] K4B4G1646E-BYK0 :Wi-Fi/BT Combo Chip: [[Marvell]] 88W8897 (?) :Antenna Switch: [[Skyworks]] SKY3438 :Audio Amplifier: [[Texas Instruments]] TAS5720 :LED Driver: [[NXP]] PCA9955BTW :MEMS Microphones: S19548562
==See also== *[[Google Home]] • [https://www.engadget.com/2016/11/03/google-home-review/ Engadget] *[[Google Home Max (H0B)]] • [https://www.engadget.com/2017/12/19/google-home-max-review/ Engadget] *[[Google Home Mini (H0A)]] • [https://teardowns.abiresearch.com/teardowns/pe_googleteardown-home-mini-h0a-0/ ABI] • [https://medium.com/@justlv/google-home-mini-teardown-comparison-to-echo-dot-and-giving-technology-a-voice-c59a23724a26 Medium] *[[Google OnHub]] • [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32823-google-tp-link-onhub-router-reviewed SmallNetBuilder] • [https://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/OnHub+Teardown/48129 iFixit] *[[Google Pixel Buds]] • FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/SZGG015B SZGG015B] • [https://medium.com/@justlv/google-pixel-buds-teardown-396183cbbc18 Medium]
